entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Get PrimaryKey value in SavingChangesAsync interceptor #33686
  • ModelBuilder and UseIdentityColumn fails to set identity property on column #33684

Closed

  • Unable to resolve service for type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContextOptions #33661
  • The instance of entity type 'XXXX' cannot be tracked because another instance with the key value 'XXX' is already being tracked. When attaching existing entities, ensure that only one entity instance with a given key value is attached. #33629
